About Me

Resume

Professionally I am a Rails developer (5 years of full-stack Rails development) who studies blockchain technology on the weekends. I have been a Wall Street options trader (silver and gold), teacher (English), and motorcycle mechanic (specializing in classic motorcycles).

Lately I've been enjoying creating PostgreSQL views and experimenting to make them as efficient as possible, especially over ActiveRecord. I was really in to Arduino for a while, here are some slides of a presentation I gave and some information on a project I did for a perfume company, here is the prototype in action. Of course I also need to step away from the computer from time to time... outside of coding I do motorcycle stunts on my dirtbike and my msx.

My expertise

Stuff that i can help with

Ruby on Rails

Whether adding new functionality, debugging, testing, or making updates, if it's anything to do with RoR I can help.

JavaScript

JavaScript is fun and I enjoy slinging data around. Well versed in Angular, Vue,Backbone, Knockout, D3, some Node.

SQL

PostgreSQL and MySQL, I appreciate good architecture. Lately I've been experimenting with PostgreSQL's recursive querying.

Project Management and Estimation

I like keeping things organized. Estimating is inherently challenging in software, I think I'm improving everyday.

E-Commerce

I worked on Wall Street for 5 years, I enjoy business and applying that experience to web application development..

Client Representation and Consultation

Getting to learn about an industry or how a business works is another great benefit to software development. Over the years I have been in constant contact with CEOs and business owners, their success is mine and I love helping to make their passions profitable.
